vampire_lords.name: Vampire Lords
vampire_lords.description: The Vampire Lords are powerful vampires who command legions of undead to do their bidding. They defeat their foes with powerful death magic and hordes of undead.

traitor_legions.name: Traitor Legions
traitor_legions.description: The Traitor Legions are those who chose to fight for evil instead of order and made a pact with the dark gods. The Traitor Legions use deadly traitor warriors and other barbarians to swiftly crush their foes.

haunting_ghosts.name: Haunting Ghosts
haunting_ghosts.description: The Haunting Ghosts are a collection of undead spirits which haunt their hallowed grave sites. The Ghostly Undead use fear and ethereal movement to wash over their foes and scare them into defeat.

eternal_protectors.name: Eternal Protectors
eternal_protectors.description: The Eternal Protectors are sworn to protect those who cannot protect themselves and to ward off evil. They wear tough armor and wield mighty weapons to strike down those are unjust.

skirmish.name: Battle (Core)
skirmish.description: A well-rounded force for taking on any mission.

inspired.name: Inspired
inspired.description: Upgrade one Leader model with Inspired.
inspired.flavor: This model inspires the best in those who serve them.

blast.name: Shock Wave
blast.description: Target enemy unit within 12" takes 3 hits with AP 1. This power may be cast unlimited times.
blast.flavor: This enemy is hit by a single blast of shock.

light_armor.name: Light Armor
light_armor.description: This model has +1 to its Save characteristic.

heavy_armor.name: Heavy Armor
heavy_armor.description: This model has +2 to its Save characteristic.

skirmishers.name: Skirmishers
skirmishers.description: This unit has a 4" coherency and may not be more than 8" away from any model in the unit at the end of a move action.

ethereal.name: Ethereal
ethereal.description: This model may ignore other models and any terrain when moving.

shield.name: Shield
shield.description: This model increases its Save by 1.
